title: The Race To Replace Africa’s Forest-Killing Fuel

media:group.media:title: The Race To Replace Africa’s Forest-Killing Fuel
media:group.media:description:
Charcoal production is the leading cause of deforestation in Africa. A Nairobi startup says replacing it with bioethanol could save forests as well as lives.

#COP27 #bloombergquicktake #africa
